int: Return to the memory border and re -interpret human and nature with voices.CICADA span the time difference will make past works such as tide -to -tiders; fifteen years long travel to feel each former white and rest.In the past, we never disappeared our love and stare, such as a song and a forest, such as wetlands and dolphins, they are still waiting for being played again, being remembered by you and me.Cicada believes: "Each song will evolve them to grow with us." In the past, the new interpretation of the new interpretation of the emotional sedimentation of the emotional sea tide was brought back to the wind and rain in the past. Review records more accurately chase the notes with emotional anchor emotions with emotions.When we used the current retrospective, we still loved and moved in the past.Performance track 1 Waves and strokes over the Gravel Beach. Falling in the golden yellow grass slope 9 Looking up at the sea level performance song, night scene 1 was originally a place that was originally home. The city that jumped out of the water 7 after the coastal mountains 8 turned off the lights. The CICADA was intertwined by the CICADA in 2009 by the CICADA Army in the subsidy performance team and the main creator.The reason why CICADA is named is because people notice that the appearance of cicadas often hear their voices rather than see their shape.Cicada began to create land in Taiwan in 2013.The theme of "The Border Passing" is the West Coast "Looking up at the Sea Plane" is the East Coast and the Pacific and extended to whale dolphins, corals and turtles in 2017 to launch animal -themed "Where are you all going".On the tenth year of the group, Cicada walked from the ocean to the mountains "Walking into the Fog Forest" like a mountaineering diary written by music.In 2022, through the source of the pursuit of the stream, the perspective was transferred to the forests and valleys between the mountains and the mountains.The list of production team performances CICADA violin Xu Yankai cello Yang Tingzheng piano Jiang Zhi Jiemu guitar Cai Yiyang's visiting middle violin The role of farmers has developed a very characteristic orchestra to attract more people to pay attention to the voices of local youths.After the 2008 Ballad Corps, the series of local industrial cultural operations have been profound in the field survey, local small travel, local industrial promotion, and community construction.The four -year background blue banana band has become the energy of farmers to play the influence of the influence of the influence of the influence of music and actual actions. Therefore, the energy of surviving and brightening the old signboards began to gather social actions.In 2009, the first EP "Banana He is not fat" said that the problem of the banana industry in Taiwan has also successfully attracted the society to start paying attention to the banana industry.In 2013, the first music album "Community Large and Small" was transformed from the public affairs of the community to music to music. It was the first music work in Taiwan with the theme of community creation.In 2018, the "Planting Youth" was released as an important mileage work in the 10th year of the army to tell the warm and honest movement of warm land.Tour Taiwan, Hong Kong, Japan, Singapore, and Malaysia.2020 released the single "You are a driver, my guest".The reason for creating in 2022 is not that you will be selected as the south and sing original songs.In 2024, the single "Film of Fate Investment is not too sweet" heard the unique flavor of the fruits and people in the eyes of farmers.In the past 15 years, the orchestra has served as banana farmers and continued to accumulate more than 800 performances. int: Did you eat fruit today?Come and feel the really sweet feeling!It turns out that it is called "Fruit of Yuan Tun" so that you can't miss it as a foodie for agricultural products!Freshly listed quality guarantees the original place of origin of the original place of origin from the roots of the tongue roots. Following the fruits in the most mixed melody and the handsomeness of the countryside. banana".The creation base sets out a sincere and smooth rock song for his hometown of Kaohsiung Qishan from the rural emotions to his hometown.Taiqing Banana is the original intention of the orchestra that combines rural industries and music in Taiwan to convey the care of land, the observation of the industrial rise and decline in the song and live performance of the banana industry of the Qishan of the hometown, and the enthusiastic combination of practical musicians and musicians and musicians and musicians and the practice of practical enthusiasm. The role of farmers has developed a very characteristic orchestra to attract more people to pay attention to the voices of local youths.After the 2008 Ballad Corps, the series of local industrial cultural operations have been profound in the field survey, local small travel, local industrial promotion, and community construction.The four -year background blue banana band has become the energy of farmers to play the influence of the influence of the influence of the influence of music and actual actions. Therefore, the energy of surviving and brightening the old signboards began to gather social actions.In 2009, the first EP "Banana He is not fat" said that the problem of the banana industry in Taiwan has also successfully attracted the society to start paying attention to the banana industry.In 2013, the first music album "Community Large and Small" was transformed from the public affairs of the community to music to music. It was the first music work in Taiwan with the theme of community creation.In 2018, the "Planting Youth" was released as an important mileage work in the 10th year of the army to tell the warm and honest movement of warm land.Tour Taiwan, Hong Kong, Japan, Singapore, and Malaysia.2020 released the single "You are a driver, my guest".The reason for creating in 2022 is not that you will be selected as the south and sing original songs.In 2024, the single "Film of Fate Investment is not too sweet" heard the unique flavor of the fruits and people in the eyes of farmers.In the past 15 years, the orchestra has served as banana farmers and continued to accumulate more than 800 performances. No matter the temple fair, the arts and cultural celebrations, the promotion of agricultural production and the promotion of the dynamic agricultural promotion from the land, the music and industry Fully combined into the corner of Taiwan society.Turning reversing the grief of the banana industry in Taiwan and the characteristics of driving the market.This year, the fruits of the creative fate are not too sweet as the tourism orchestra to experience the addition of the new drummer "APLLE" after the last ticket sales tour and the group members have successively completed the marriage and growth of the marriage of marriage. tit: The 40th anniversary of the article "No longer drifting 365 miles"
int: The 40th anniversary of the article "No longer drifting 365 miles" was officially launched in 2024, which has been officially launched in 40 years. After his family arrived in Indonesia, he studied in the United States and Canada after studying in Japan. In 1983, he was introduced to the Emi Taiwan (Emi Taiwan) in October 1984, "Back to Singapore to visit relatives in Singapore. road".Because the growth process of the article traveled to many countries has created his unique style, and the content of the lyrics is full of wandering and foreign travelers who missed the old land. Travel in Taiwan, China, Singapore and Malaysia.A high -pitched voice of 365 miles not only sang a wandering tour, but also the endless suffering in his heart, so he was widely welcomed in the Asian region.In 1985, he won the Best Newcomer Award of the Golden Volual Award and the "Golden Ding Award" Best Singer Award. The amazing record made the article the first classic golden song of the singer in the late 1980s.The famous works include "The Clouds of the Hometown", "Three Sixty -Fifty -five Miles", "Ancient Moon Zhao Shijin", "Wangtian", "Thousands of Love You" and other famous songs. favorite.å”®ç¥¨èµ„è®¯æ¼‚æ³Šå°åŒ—åœºæ´»åŠ¨æ—¶é—´ï¼š20241019ï¼ˆå…­ï¼‰ 1930æ­£å¼å¼€æ¼”æ´»åŠ¨åœ°ç‚¹ï¼šå°åŒ—å›½é™…ä¼šè®®ä¸­å¿ƒTICCï¼ˆå°åŒ—å¸‚ä¿¡ä¹‰åŒºä¿¡ä¹‰è·¯äº”æ®µ1å·ï¼‰ç¥¨ä»·ï¼š3600ã€3200ã€2800ã€2400ã€2000ã€1600ã€ 1200æ¼‚æ³Šå°ä¸­åœºæ´»åŠ¨æ—¶é—´ï¼š20241109ï¼ˆå…­ï¼‰ 1930æ­£å¼å¼€æ¼”æ´»åŠ¨åœ°ç‚¹ï¼šå°ä¸­ä¸­å…´å¤§å­¦æƒ èªå ‚ï¼ˆå°ä¸­å¸‚å—åŒºå…´å¤§è·¯145å·ï¼‰ç¥¨ä»·ï¼š3600ã€3200ã€2800ã€2400ã€2000ã€1600ã€1200ã€ 800æ¼‚æ³Šé«˜é›„åœºæ´»åŠ¨æ—¶é—´ï¼š20241208ï¼ˆæ—¥ï¼‰ 1600æ­£å¼å¼€æ¼”æ´»åŠ¨åœ°ç‚¹ï¼šé«˜é›„æµè¡ŒéŸ³ä¹ä¸­å¿ƒæµ·éŸ³é¦†é«˜é›„å¸‚ç›åŸ•åŒºçœŸçˆ±è·¯1å·ç¥¨ä»·ï¼š3600ã€3200ã€2800ã€2400ã€2000ã€1600ã€1200ã€ 800 Details: Please contact the organizer of the Fanpage Page:

tit: Mono 25th Anniversary Orchestral Tour Oath Asia Tour 2024
int: Mono has continuously challenged the various possibilities of exploratory instrumental rock in the past few decades. This has also made them one of the most important Asian bands to celebrate the 25th anniversary of the band and will start their first 12 -person orchestra. As the Asian tour, with the success of their new album Oath, it is expected that this performance will be a particularly and beautiful performance.About Oath, what do we have done in 2020 what will be the existentialism of the former classic night idlers almost become the topic of everyone's daily discussion. What can we do in a limited life? Mono discusses some themes that are the relationship between light and darkness, the hope of facing disaster, the duality of life and death. In the 12th album, they think about the time for life and how to make full use of that period of time.An old friend and partner of Steve Albini recorded and mixed together to let OATH open with the slow rise of orchestra to make the orchestra into the atmosphere before joining the violin.In the 71 minutes of the entire album, Mono thought about time and life to add a beautiful atmosphere to a beautiful atmosphere to a new height in a new height at a beautiful atmosphere.Mono challenged himself with a publicism related existentialism and provided kind reflection with the album of OATH instead of fleeting.â€œæˆ‘ä»¬ç”Ÿæ´»åœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªä»å°å°±æ²¡æœ‰æ”¹å˜çš„èª“è¨€å½“ä¸­å¬é£åœ¨å”±æ­Œæˆ‘ä»¬æ˜¯å®‡å®™çš„ä¸€éƒ¨åˆ†æˆ‘ä»¬å·²ç»çŸ¥é“æˆ‘ä»¬è¯¥æ€ä¹ˆåšä»¥åŠä»€ä¹ˆæ˜¯ç”Ÿå‘½ä¸­æœ€é‡è¦çš„Takaakira 'Goto',MONOMONO 25th Anniversary Orchestral TourOATH Asia Tour 2024Featuring 12Piece Orchestralive in Taipeidate20241106venuezepp New TaipeIMEDOOR 1900 Start 2000TicketAdv 200022002400 will use a full seat method (except 2F station areas) to enter the section of the 2F station area in line.

tit: The 40th anniversary of the article "No longer drifting 365 miles"
int: The 40th anniversary of the article "No longer drifting 365 miles" was officially launched in 2024, which has been officially launched in 40 years. After his family arrived in Indonesia, he studied in the United States and Canada after studying in Japan. In 1983, he was introduced to the Emi Taiwan (Emi Taiwan) in October 1984, "Back to Singapore to visit relatives in Singapore. road".Because the growth process of the article traveled to many countries has created his unique style, and the content of the lyrics is full of wandering and foreign travelers who missed the old land. Travel in Taiwan, China, Singapore and Malaysia.A high -pitched voice of 365 miles not only sang a wandering tour, but also the endless suffering in his heart, so he was widely welcomed in the Asian region.In 1985, he won the Best Newcomer Award of the Golden Volual Award and the "Golden Ding Award" Best Singer Award. The amazing record made the article the first classic golden song of the singer in the late 1980s.The famous works include "The Clouds of the Hometown", "Three Sixty -Fifty -five Miles", "Ancient Moon Zhao Shijin", "Wangtian", "Thousands of Love You" and other famous songs. favorite.å”®ç¥¨èµ„è®¯æ¼‚æ³Šå°åŒ—åœºæ´»åŠ¨æ—¶é—´ï¼š20241019ï¼ˆå…­ï¼‰ 1930æ­£å¼å¼€æ¼”æ´»åŠ¨åœ°ç‚¹ï¼šå°åŒ—å›½é™…ä¼šè®®ä¸­å¿ƒTICCï¼ˆå°åŒ—å¸‚ä¿¡ä¹‰åŒºä¿¡ä¹‰è·¯äº”æ®µ1å·ï¼‰ç¥¨ä»·ï¼š3600ã€3200ã€2800ã€2400ã€2000ã€1600ã€ 1200æ¼‚æ³Šå°ä¸­åœºæ´»åŠ¨æ—¶é—´ï¼š20241109ï¼ˆå…­ï¼‰ 1930æ­£å¼å¼€æ¼”æ´»åŠ¨åœ°ç‚¹ï¼šå°ä¸­ä¸­å…´å¤§å­¦æƒ èªå ‚ï¼ˆå°ä¸­å¸‚å—åŒºå…´å¤§è·¯145å·ï¼‰ç¥¨ä»·ï¼š3600ã€3200ã€2800ã€2400ã€2000ã€1600ã€1200ã€ 800æ¼‚æ³Šé«˜é›„åœºæ´»åŠ¨æ—¶é—´ï¼š20241208ï¼ˆæ—¥ï¼‰ 1600æ­£å¼å¼€æ¼”æ´»åŠ¨åœ°ç‚¹ï¼šé«˜é›„æµè¡ŒéŸ³ä¹ä¸­å¿ƒæµ·éŸ³é¦†é«˜é›„å¸‚ç›åŸ•åŒºçœŸçˆ±è·¯1å·ç¥¨ä»·ï¼š3600ã€3200ã€2800ã€2400ã€2000ã€1600ã€1200ã€ 800 Details: Please contact the organizer of the Fanpage Page:

tit: The 40th anniversary of the article "No longer drifting 365 miles"
int: The 40th anniversary of the article "No longer drifting 365 miles" was officially launched in 2024, which has been officially launched in 40 years. After his family arrived in Indonesia, he studied in the United States and Canada after studying in Japan. In 1983, he was introduced to the Emi Taiwan (Emi Taiwan) in October 1984, "Back to Singapore to visit relatives in Singapore. road".Because the growth process of the article traveled to many countries has created his unique style, and the content of the lyrics is full of wandering and foreign travelers who missed the old land.
